Crydom D2425 (25A) or

comments: Crydom (2nd Link, also valid alternative), UTU PN just adds TUV support as a certification to the relay (Omron Only)
Strongly advise buying the specific steppers to reduce the chance of underperformance
Do not cheap out on this. Get a legitmate MeanWell PSU. Higher wattage is not necessary since the bed is mains powered. Higher wattage also comes with a fan which adds to the noise.
Do not cheap out on this. Get a legitmate MeanWell PSU.
Note the Mouser (Red Light) only has a 125v indicator in it. For 220/240 countries use the no light model
